login.reset_pwd_help_text: Many customers have a 6-digit login instead of email login, example 123456, if you donâ€™t remember your login number, please call or email us, we are standing by to help you log in. When you log in, you can change your login from the 6 digit user id into your email address under the tab Company Information / Login Data.
